data.title: Lulu Bridge by Auster Paul, Signed
data.meta_description: Lulu Na Moscie Scenopis Wywiady Z Tworcami Filmu Polish Translation of Lulu on the Bridge by Paul Auster and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Trade Paperback. Condition: Used - Good. Signed by Paul Auster and Mira Sorvino. Polish translation of 'Lulu on the Bridge' in good condition. Cover has some rubbing, light chipping to edges. Binding is tight. Signed By Author.

First edition, first printing. Signed by Auster on the title page. This was Auster's directorial debut. A couple small indentations to front wrap, else fine. Glossy, photographic wrappers (paperback).

Soft cover. Condition: Fine. First Edition. First edition, first prnt. Paperback Original edition. Signed by Auster on the title page. Glossy illustrated wraps. Black & white and color illustrations from the film production and movie stills. Unread copy in Fine condition. The film version was Auster's directorial debut. Cast included Harvey Keitel, Mira Sorvino and Willem Dafoe. Signed by Author(s).

Soft cover. Condition: Fine. No Jacket. 1st Edition. Fine copy of the UK first edition in original wrappers as issued. One minor crush to upper corner of the rear cover ( 5mm) but essentially a fine copy. No reading creases or other marks to the covers. Signed by the author to the title page. Very scarce as a signed UK first edition. Signed by Author(s).

Soft cover. Condition: New. No Jacket. 1st Edition. New York: Holt [1998]. First edition. First printing. Softbound. Large paperback, paperback original. SIGNED BY AUSTER on title page (his name only). Mint condition, unread. Signed by Author(s).
